title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Dynamic subject titles for the briefing email

description.newValue:
[We've paused sending briefing emails starting early 2023 and this service will continue to stay paused until further notice.] Currently, the subject line of the Briefing email is static to "Your daily briefing." Beginning in November, the briefing email will feature dynamic subject lines based on particular content available in the email for the day and will enable users to have a quick preview of values presented in emails directly from the subject line.
GA date: November CY2022
